entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023
